nodes.text: Zebulon Dak Speeder Corporation was a small-scale manufacturer of vehicles that was established by accomplished engineer Zebulon Dak in his own name. It stayed successfully competitive in the galactic speeder market by identifying and exploiting the niche of those with a dream of competing in speeder racing, of which Dak himself was a fanatic fan. The company did this by producing speeders like the Joben T-85 speeder bike, which became popular in the Outer Rim Territories, which had shorter runs then the speeders produced by larger companies and appealed to racing fans.
